description: This file defines a React component 'RecipeDetailPage' responsible for displaying detailed information about a specific recipe, including fetching data from an API, handling user interactions such as favoriting and editing, and rendering the recipe's image, ingredients, and instructions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the recipe data from the API using the recipe ID and updates the component's state.

methods.name: onFav
methods.description: Handles the toggle favorite action for the recipe and reloads the recipe data.
